Class TabularFiles

      • newTabularFileReader

        public static TabularDataFileReader<List<String>> newTabularFileReader(Reader reader,
                                                                       char delimiterChar,
                                                                       String endOfLineSymbols,
                                                                       Character quoteChar,
                                                                       boolean headerLine,
                                                                       Integer lineToSkipBeforeHeader)
                                                                throws IOException
        Get a new TabularDataFileReader.
        Parameters:
        reader -
        delimiterChar -
        endOfLineSymbols -
        quoteChar - Nullable
        headerLine - do we expect the first line before the data to be a header line
        lineToSkipBeforeHeader - Nullable. How many line(s) is required to skip in the file before reading the header or the data. This can be used to skip a comment block but if there is a header line, the comment block shall be before the header.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • newTabularFileReader

        public static TabularDataFileReader<List<String>> newTabularFileReader(Reader reader,
                                                                       char delimiterChar,
                                                                       boolean headerLine)
                                                                throws IOException
        Get a new TabularDataFileReader using default quote char (") and default endOfLineSymbols (\n). Usage: 
         
 try (TabularDataFileReader<List<String>> reader = TabularFiles.newTabularFileReader(
  Files.newBufferedReader(Paths.get("/tmp/test.csv"), StandardCharsets.UTF_8), ',', true)) {
  ...
  }
        Parameters:
        reader -
        delimiterChar -
        headerLine -
        Throws:
        IOException
